holidays.title: Alien Day
holidays.description: Let your imaginations guide you to Ridley Scott's land of green beings, where weird things happen.

holidays.title: Audubon Day
holidays.description: Learn about an enduring conservation legacy, complete with some fun tips and activity suggestions.

holidays.title: Confederate Heroes' Day
holidays.description: We get to place flowers on these heroes' graves as we retell of their heroic deeds.

holidays.title: Get Organized Day
holidays.description: Putting off organizing your space for ages? Today’s the time to stop procrastinating!

holidays.title: Hug an Australian Day
holidays.description: What a perfect day to spread some love! Hug a loved one; keep the affection flowing.

holidays.title: Hung Kings Festival
holidays.description: Did you know the festival’s official name is Death Anniversary of the Hung Kings?

holidays.title: International Chernobyl Disaster Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Think about nuclear energy on this day, and what it can do for us.

holidays.title: Mother Father Deaf Day
holidays.description: Share your experiences of deaf parents and the children of deaf parents on this special day.

holidays.title: National Ai Day
holidays.description: Discover more about Ai and the famous people who shared this name.

holidays.title: National Dissertation Day
holidays.description: Today serves as a reminder for students to get back on track and complete their dissertations.

holidays.title: National Gabriel Day
holidays.description: This is the day to celebrate all the Gabriels in your life, famous or not!

holidays.title: National Garage Day
holidays.description: This National Garage Day, get your creative juices flowing and work in your garage!

holidays.title: National Help A Horse Day
holidays.description: We are saddling up to create awareness around taking better care of horses.

holidays.title: National Jason Day
holidays.description: Learn more about some of the men who made the name Jason famous across history.

holidays.title: National Kids and Pets Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the bond between your fur babies and your actual babies this National Kids and Pets Day!

holidays.title: National No Makeup Day
holidays.description: Makeup allows us to express ourselves and feel confident while we're out and about.

holidays.title: National Pet Parents Day
holidays.description: It’s a great day to treat your pet, or take them for a checkup.

holidays.title: National South Dakota Day
holidays.description: This National South Dakota Day, appreciate the breathtaking beauty and thriving wildlife of South Dakota.

holidays.title: National Static Cling Day
holidays.description: Everyone get charged up, and let’s celebrate National Static Cling Day!

holidays.title: Remember Your First Kiss Day
holidays.description: Disregard your diaries today and sojourn into your minds those special first kiss moments.

holidays.title: Richter Scale Day
holidays.description: Today we pay a tribute to the man who invented the Richter scale.

holidays.title: Secretaries' Day (Colombia)
holidays.description: This Secretaries’ Day, prove to secretaries just how much you appreciate their efforts.

holidays.title: Stop Food Waste Day
holidays.description: It’s crazy to think that a third of the food produced on Earth goes to waste!

holidays.title: Turkmen Racing Horse Festival
holidays.description: Saddle up to catch the horse fever that grips the Turkmen each year with this festival.

holidays.title: World Burlesque Day
holidays.description: Get ready to be entertained, we’re going to celebrate World Burlesque Day!

holidays.title: World Intellectual Property Day
holidays.description: Join us today as we salute all creators and inventors for their contribution to society’s development.

holidays.title: Channing Tatum’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fantastic actor has a second name and it’s “Hollywood’s Explosive Action Star!”

holidays.title: Melania Trump’s Birthday
holidays.description: This socialite truly has it all  — former First Lady, supermodel, and entrepreneur.
